author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Custom shower niche tip…I always account for the backer board, thin-set mortar and tile when building the niche. It’s especially important for mitered niches that have to align perfectly. I enjoy mitering niches and the challenge of making them look good. Our Video Library has over 425 step-by-step tutorials to help you build a shower at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#showerniche #tileshower #bathroomremodel
title: Custom Shower Niche Tip - #shorts #homerepairtutor
